name: Nix Configuration
description: The NixOS configuration that I use on my personal machines.

name: E-Waste PSA Website
description: A PSA website outlining the dangers of e-waste, as well as steps to keep e-waste out of landfills.

name: Jester Gesture Recognition Model
description: A hand gesture recognition ML model that was trained with the 20bn Jester Dataset using a 3D Convolutional Neural Network.

name: Arctic OS
description: An arch-based linux distribution with a graphical installer (made and maintained as a hobby). Currently working to make new GNOME and KDE Plasma profiles alongside the existing XFCE ISO.

name: Rust HTTP Server
description: An HTTP server library written in vanilla Rust with zero dependencies.

name: Redlight
description: A faster & more private client for Reddit.

name: TypeTest
description: A web application that lets you view and save your typing stats such as WPM and accuracy in detail.

name: Chatt
description: A real-time chat application with saved rooms and accounts.
